metadata.title: CVE-2017-0334 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in the NVIDIA GPU driver couldenable a local malicious application to access data outside of itspermission levels. This issue is rated as High because it could be used toaccess sensitive data without explicit user permission. Product: Android.Versions: Kernel-3.18. Android ID: A-33245849. References: N-CVE-2017-0334.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
